data.title: Best bakery in town
data.text:
You could get sweet and savory at this place. The cup cakes are light and airy with the best frosting in town. My daughter loves their canolies. The flavors and decorations are constantly changing, so there's always something new. Cinnamon buns, eclairs, cakes, pies,cake pops....so much to choose from and all equally delicious. 
If sweet isn't your thing they have a savory menu to choose from.
